content.rendered:
[vc_row content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1595402751913{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-6″][g5plus_heading title=”PROPPERTEE REALTORS” el_class=”mg-bottom-35″][vc_column_text]PROPPERTEE REALTORS started its working from 2018 and is one of the fastest growing companies in Real Estate Sector. We mainly deal in NCR region, in residential, commercial and leasing. We have a good base of our clients and so as the properties according to their requirements. Our operations are in EAST DELHI, NOIDA, GREATER NOIDA, NOIDA EXPRESSWAY, NOIDA EXTENSION AND SECTOR-150, Along with that we are also expending it to Pune and Bangalore soon. Our motto is to make property buying and selling as simple and comfortable to our clients.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]We strongly believes that in BUSINESS “U”comes first and “I” later so just by this theory our clients as YOU are more important to us as compared to a developer or builder. As in the service industry we provide maximum paper work and documents related services at the door steps by our professionals.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]We as PROPPERTEE REALTORS are truly and faithfully committed to our commitments and words to always provide our clients and customers the best knowledge and services, according to their needs we as a professional also provide with our best portfolio manager and team with their 10 years of experience. We are also committed to the well-being and fair treatment of the public, as well as our professionals[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-6″][vc_single_image image=”180″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1595402751913{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-6″][vc_single_image image=”5372″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]“There’s nothing more demoralizing than a leader who can’t clearly articulate why we’re doing what we’re doing.”  – James Kouzes and Barry Posner[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-6″][g5plus_heading title=”ABOUT JATIN CHOPRA” el_class=”mg-bottom-35″][vc_column_text]He gives the best of his skills, knowledge & ability with due sincerity, devotion & hard work in every given opportunity. There is no limit and no age for getting knowledge and creativity with JATIN CHOPRA. The simple living person with a lot of energy in himself is a self-made entrepreneur who has given his best in IT as well as in MLM, with his intellectual and professional skills he has been a brilliant stage person and human trainer and with his true dedication he came in real estate as a builder in delhi then as a consultant.
The educational background of Jatin chopra includes B.Com and Web Designing Skills. He completed his initial education from Delhi, initially he started his career in MLM with CIPL in 2008 and learned the professional skills of communication and marketing.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]He came into real estate in 2011 and starter with construction of independent floors in delhi and ncr in his own supervision, After getting an ample of knowledge of construction he decided to move on to Noida and Soon he became part of NOIDA market and remained there till 2012. The journey did not stop here, he then made his foot forward into the hard core sales and begun as a consultation to home buyers and investors from 2012 he is emphasizing the market and the requirement of clients.
This real estate industry runs in the most organised way where the buyer and developer both come together with all legal transparencies with the involvement of legal authorities as RERA under which he has started to develop a web platform and to provide authentic information to the buyers. His motto is to find the balance between business foresight, performance, and character. Thus he has the vision, courage, integrity, humility and focus along with the ability to plan strategically and catalyse cooperation amongst his team.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” overlay_mode=”color” overlay_color=”rgba(255,255,255,0.7)” css=”.vc_custom_1595403067394{padding-top: 40px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-image: url(https://proppertee.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/12/bg-contact-form.jpg?id=166) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″ offset=”vc_col-md-offset-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-2 vc_col-xs-offset-1 vc_col-xs-10″ el_class=”col-mb-12 col-mb-offset-0″][g5plus_heading sub_title=”ALWAYS SUPPORT YOU” title=”HOW CAN WE HELP?” el_class=”mg-bottom-35″]


YesNo
[g5plus_space desktop=”100″ tablet=”80″ tablet_portrait=”60″ mobile_landscape=”50″ mobile=”50″][/vc_column][/vc_row]
